casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Michael Scott HAMILTON. No. 124PA15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Benjamin Dowling-Sendor, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hamilton, Michael Scott. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Melissa Pelfrey, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

AMENDED ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 2nd of April 2015 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."

*839Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
